HomePage.subheading: You can ask me something like this:
HomePage.promptSuggestion1: "Hi Aisha, how are my leaderboard points looking this month?"
HomePage.promptSuggestion2: "Can you show me the deepstack tournament for tonight, please?"
HomePage.promptSuggestion3: "Help me book a seat for the $2/$5 cash game, lah."
HomePage.promptSuggestion4: "What were my results from last week?"
